mapper.sql: id, subject_id, type, content, answer, analysis, chapter, difficulty, created_time, updated_time, uploader_id, uploader
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question (subject_id, type, content, answer, analysis, chapter, difficulty, created_time, updated_time, uploader_id, uploader) VALUES (#{subjectId}, #{type}, #{content}, #{answer}, #{analysis}, #{chapter}, #{difficulty}, NOW(), NOW(), #{uploaderId}, #{uploader})
mapper.update: UPDATE question SET subject_id = #{subjectId}, type = #{type}, content = #{content}, answer = #{answer}, analysis = #{analysis}, chapter = #{chapter}, difficulty = #{difficulty}, uploader_id = #{uploaderId}, uploader = #{uploader}, updated_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM question WHERE subject_id = #{subjectId} ORDER BY created_time DESC
SELECT FROM question WHERE type = #{type} ORDER BY created_time DESC
